comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEDC4B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEDC4B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type DC4B model. These excitation systems utilize a field-controlled dc commutator exciter with a continuously acting voltage regulator having supplies obtained from the generator or auxiliary bus.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 5.4.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: efd1
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 1.75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: efd2
contents.comment: Exciter voltage at which exciter saturation is defined (E).  Typical Value = 2.33. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Regulator derivative gain (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: oelin
contents.comment: OEL input (OELin). true = LV gate false = subtract from error signal. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: seefd1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seefd2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, E (S[E]).  Typical Value = 0.27. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

contents.name: td
contents.comment: Regulator derivative filter time constant(T).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: uelin
contents.comment: UEL input (UELin). true = HV gate false = add to error signal. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: vemin
contents.comment: Minimum exciter voltage output(V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 2.7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -0.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
